LightningComponentBundle.description: Use this component to navigate to a page by providing a JSON PageReference. See PageReference documentation: https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/component-library/documentation/en/lwc/reference_page_reference_type

property.name: replaceHistory
property.label: If replace is set to true, the pageReference replaces the existing entry in the browser history so the user doesnâ€™t have to press the back button twice. The default value is false.
